attributes.action: Raise epidemiology inquiry into aberrant Thanet illness and mortality
attributes.additional_details:
The case for an epidemiology survey is compelling.   No other environmental or public health impact assessment could hold validity without the existing truths acting as baseline.  Including govt impact studies to operate an airport or such studies if presented as Court evidence. 

Concerns have included ME  ectopic pregnancy, early menopause, polycystic ovary, cancers, congenital aneurism, leukemia.  

Thanet drank the water is Thanet now sick ?  Epidemiology research is meritted/
attributes.background: Freedom of Information Responses from Environment Agency establish the factual history of sources and indicate quantities of chemicals, like cyclohexanone, that went undetected for up to 30 years into the ground water abstracted as drinking supply.
